name: OIM Biodiversity - TDWG
abstract: Defines JSON schema properties mapped to the Taxonomic Database Working Group data model. This is based on Darwin Core.
description:
## TDWG properties

Defines properties for TDWG defined elements for application in Biodiversity Domain.

Note that most of these are based on the Darwin Core - and could be factored out into two separate modules if required.

examples.title: Oceans Information Model examples
examples.content: TBD - see specific sub-profile for examples.
